name: reverse-polish-calculator
description: An implementation of a reverse polish calculator as an angular directive

scripts.test: node node_modules/karma/bin/karma start test/karma.conf.js && node_modules/protractor/bin/protractor e2e-test/protractor.conf.js
scripts.postinstall: node_modules/.bin/bower install && while true; do echo 'This project requires broccoli-cli in order to use\nthe development server and to build the project.\n' && read -p 'Would you like to install broccoli-cli?' yn && case $yn in [Yy]* ) npm install -g broccoli-cli; break;; [Nn]* ) echo 'If you change your mind later, just run "npm install -g broccoli-cli"' && exit;; * ) echo 'Please answer yes or no.';; esac done

author: Brandon Schlueter <bs@bschlueter.com>
